sellers wanted a way to sort of package their IP in a way that they could protect it and monetize it and meter it
and do things like that so we've had to invent a kind of a new way to think about packaging intellectual property both algorithms and models and make that
something that you can browse and discover and sellers can actually protect their IP likewise customers
often it's great to go get a pre trained model that somebody's used it we've got a couple of vendors for example that
have very healthcare specific models that have been trained against over seven billion anonymized patient records
and so it's a really good starting point it gives you sort of an interesting way to start with the algorithm but very often in in real world machine learning
you're going to basically do an iterative process of training and retraining your models specifically against your data and a lot of customers
in specifically heavily regulated industry don't want to make that data available to the vendor of the algorithm
and sage maker actually gives us a nice sandbox environment where you can protect the IP of the person that's created the algorithm of the model and
the customer gets to protect access to the data and they basically get to run it in escrow in the sage maker
environment and both parties stay quite happy there's been a whole lot of invention to kind of make that possible
today now what we heard from customers is we got sort of into this is there's the pain points that are pretty common
when in machine learning even if you're pretty expert at it there's a lot of time and energy sort of starting from
